title: A New Leaf
overview: Each week host Daisy Fuentes and A New Leaf will follow people on the cusp of key life inflection points, using family history, genealogy, and sometimes DNA analysis to guide them on their journey of self-discovery, and help them learn from the past while looking to the future. In partnership with AncestryÂ®, Fuentes will join families as they learn the importance of appreciating and understanding their family history and ancestors in order to make important life decisions.
